turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I get a tall salted caramel mocha with whipped cream and coconut milk from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Route 40 in Columbia, Maryland, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a tall salted caramel mocha with coconut milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on route 40, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. That's all. Thank you very much.
